Header.title: International Fin Academy
Header.paragraph: We are proffessionals in exporting and applying the Finnish education success to other parts of the world.

About.paragraph: International Fin Academy is a proffesssional organization specialized in exporting the Finnish educational system and experience to other parts of the world. Located at the beautiful city of Kokkola we have connections to big number of proffessional educators and advisors all over the world.
Why: High quality services for all education stages
Teacher training by an elite of distinguished professors from the Centria University of Applied Sciences
Why2: IFA has cooperation with Kokkola city experts, its educational facilities, the University of Centria, and Student Traveler Center

Services.name: Consulting services
Services.text: International Fin Academy offers consultation services in setting up schools and nursuries, curriculum enhancement, cooperation with well-known educational institutes and many more available upon request.

Services.name: Teachers training
Services.text: IFA approaches will  improve enthusiasm and promote successful teaching practices also to develop the skills required to compete in the job market, improve cooperation between the educational institution and employees and reinforce the curriculum.

Services.name: Learning environment design
Services.text: In IFA we know how to design a well-functioning learning environments. Including Building curricula which balance, academic performance and well-being. Along with guiding curriculum implementation.

Testimonials.title: Kokkola city
Testimonials.text: The beautiful city of Kokkola, which has great experience in educational systems through many institutes. That makes it a valuable contributer to any education-related organization

Testimonials.title: Centeria university
Testimonials.text: Centria University of Applied Sciences is a higher educational institution. It offers programs ranging from Business Management to Environmental Chemistry and Technology, Information technology, and Nursing, entirely taught in English.

Testimonials.title: VillaElba youth center
Testimonials.text: Youth centres organize guided adventure, nature, environmental, cultural and camp activities in a high-quality, natural setting in accordance with the Youth Act.

Features.title: Educational system improvement
Features.text: In International Fin Academy we Adapt and apply Finnish educational expertise to complement each school's unique context.

Features.title: Uniqe learning experience
Features.text: Offer flexible and work-based learning opportunities for Schools and other education providers who want to increase the  Attractiveness of TVET by providing alternative or complementary studies for their students.

Features.title: Tutors development
Features.text: Raise the quality of education by providing  number of professional services helping teatures to develope creative minds and create enlightened thoughts.

Features.title: Briter future
Features.text: International Fin Academy will assist it's clients to Co-create sustainable learning communities where people succeed as learners for life.
